思路: // @Title: 颜色分类 (Sort Colors) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2020-11-18 14:35:20 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 36.8 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public void sortColors(int[] nums) { if(nums.length<=1){ return; } int p0=0,p2=nums.length-1; for(int i=0;i<=p2;i++){ if(nums[i]==0){ swap(nums,i,p0); p0++; } if(nums[i]==2){ swap(nums,i,p2); p2--; if(nums[i]!=1){ i--; } } } } public void swap(int[] nums,int a,int b){ int temp=nums[a]; nums[a]=nums[b]; nums[b]=temp; } } +++ title = “颜色分类 (Sort Colors)” draft = false +++
